titleStmt.title: A Catalogue of the names of such persons as are, or are reputed to be of the Romish religion (not as yet convicted) being inhabitants within the county of Middlesex, cities of London and Westminster, and weekly bills of mortality, exactly as they are ordered to be incerted in the several commissions appointed for the more speedy convicting of such as shall be found of that religion.

A Catalogue of the names of such persons as are, or are reputed to be of the Romish religion (not as yet convicted) being inhabitants within the county of Middlesex, cities of London and Westminster, and weekly bills of mortality, exactly as they are ordered to be incerted in the several commissions appointed for the more speedy convicting of such as shall be found of that religion.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
